Darkfate/Blacknighmare/Scorpyo::

Darkfate shot two times destroying the missiles and he shot several 
times more (23) against Gremlin.

Blacknighmare moved quikly avoiding the shot, she took other feather 
knife and started to hit Jackle's head. She tried to decapitate him. 
She was ready to avoid other shot 'cause she had a small surprice in 
her mind

Scorpyo rolled away and shot against Pheniox (25 shots)"Me kill 
femme" screamed the insane male


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Gremlin saw Darkfates blast and rolled away. He eyes the 
curiously odd 
> bot, and then sent two large missles wizzing at hom. Then, he 
returned to 
> Drillbit.
> 
>        The armor on Jackle's back sent the feather knife sliding 
away. Jackle 
> turned, and fired at Blacknightmares face, then wnet back to 
Drillbit.
> 
>        Pheniox ducked from Scorpyo's shots, but was hit in her left 
wing. She 
> shook it off and watched as a few trees began to fall. She sent 
some 
> fireballs at him.
